info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 9:26PM CDT until March 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR CENTRAL POLK AND SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 826 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Opal to near Little Missouri Falls Recreation Area, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Mena... Hatfield... Shady... Opal... Mimosa... Little Missouri Falls Recreatio... Bard Springs Recreation Area... Caney Creek Wilderness... Mountain Fork... Polk County Fairgrounds... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Mena Intermountain Airport... Acorn... Big Fork... Board Camp... Rocky... Nunley... Ink... Camp Pioneer... Pine Ridge... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
